title.narrative: Building and enhancing the evidence base for nature-based solutions to climate change (ICF research and development)

description.narrative: This programme will deliver an integrated package of projects to strengthen knowledge and understanding of nature-based solutions (NbS) internationally and inform the design and delivery of global policy and programming . This programme of basic and applied research will provide data and practical tools to support the design, delivery and evaluation of NbS in low and middle income countries. It will also ensure that decision-makers in developing countries have access to research outputs in a format that is useable and accessible, so maximising their uptake and impact.
